channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Pok?mon: Black and White
channel.desc: When Ash and his friends enter a battle competition in Eindoak Town, they meet and befriend the mythical Pok?mon Victini. However, disaster strikes when misguided wanderer Damon seizes Victini for his own plans! Can Ash prove himself a hero and earn the help of the legendary Zekrom to rescue Victini and save Eindoak Town.
